buyConfirm: You don’t have this yet!? Get it for
insufficientCoins: YOU NEED A TAD MORE. THIS COSTS
unlockOnly: This is for premium racers only. Minimum
consumeLife: Do you want to spend a life and continue going?
buyLife: OUCH! BUT NO MATTER, BUY A SHIELD AND KEEP ON GOING FOR

description.life: Even the best can make a mess. With this, you continue after a crash.
description.magnet: Magnets attract cash. This makes them last longer and spawn often.
description.coins: Boost your luck and get loads more gold and silver. How? Nobody cares.

text.desktop: Strafe left or right with the arrow keys. Get cash. Don’t crash.
text.mobile: Strafe left or right by swiping. Get cash. Don’t crash.

text.desktop: Press up or down to rise or duck. Duck in midair to land quickly.
text.mobile: Swipe up or down to rise or duck. Duck in midair to land quickly.
